snippet: A student organizer of Divest Harvard and a professor of global environmental politics at American University discuss the value of divestment campaigns.
lead_paragraph: A student organizer of Divest Harvard and a professor of global environmental politics at American University discuss the value of divestment campaigns.

headline.main: To Reduce Warming, Start With College Divestment
headline.print_headline: To Reduce Warming, Start With College Divestment
